required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparing Human and Computer-based Quantification of Airway Stenosis From Bronchoscopic Images
clinical_study.official_title: Comparing Human and Computer-based Quantification of Airway Stenosis From Bronchoscopic Images

brief_summary.textblock: This is a pilot study to assess the utility of the automatic stenosis index quantification using 3D Slicer software (Computer-based Quantification). We will recruit three physicians to perform a similar analysis using video images of the same bronchoscopes images (Human-based Quantification). This study relates to the latter data collection.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Physicians enrolling the study are exclusively assigned to Human-based Quantification.

primary_outcome.description: The stenosis index quantified subjectively by the physician, defined ration between cross-sectional area of the obstructed airway and that of a normal airway.

arm_group.description: No intervention. No support tool will be used for quantifying airway stenosis from the bronchoscopic images collected previously.
Computer based support tool will quantifying airway stenosis from the bronchoscopic images collected previously.

intervention.description: Human-based Quantification of Airway Stenosis From Bronchoscopic Images.

intervention.intervention_name: Computer-based Quantification of Airway Stenosis From Bronchoscopic Images.
intervention.description: Computer-based Quantification of Airway Stenosis From Bronchoscopic Images.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Physicians who are trained in bronchoscopy.
- Physicians who are willing and able to understand the scope of the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Physicians who are not trained in bronchoscopy.
- Physicians who are unwilling and unable to understand the study procedure
- Employees under the direct supervision of the investigators conducting the research

patient_data.ipd_description: Currently, there is no plan to share IPD.
